appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the visual appearance of the application.

backgroundBlocks.label: Funny Background Blocks
backgroundBlocks.description: Show animated isometric blocks in the background

language.title: Language
language.label: Display Language
language.selectDescription: Choose the language for the user interface.

cacheData.title: Cache & Data
cacheData.description: Manage cached data and application storage.

clearCache.label: Clear Cache
clearCache.description: Clear cached metadata without losing your settings.

clearSiteData.label: Clear Site Data
clearSiteData.description: Clear all data including settings, RPC configs, and API keys.
clearSiteData.confirmMessage: This will clear all settings, RPC configurations, API keys, and cached data. The page will reload. Continue?

rpcStrategy.title: RPC Strategy
rpcStrategy.description: Choose how requests are sent to multiple RPC endpoints.

requestStrategy.label: Request Strategy
requestStrategy.fallbackDesc: Try endpoints one by one until one succeeds.
requestStrategy.raceDesc: Query all endpoints and return the fastest response.

maxParallelRequests.label: Max Parallel Requests
maxParallelRequests.description: Limit how many RPC endpoints are queried simultaneously. Lower values reduce bandwidth usage. Uses the first N endpoints from your RPC list (reorder by dragging).

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Enter your API keys for RPC providers.
apiKeys.aiDescription: Enter API keys for AI-powered blockchain analysis. At least one key is required to use the AI analyzer.

togetherai.name: Together AI
togetherai.placeholder: Enter your Together AI API key

rpcEndpoints.title: RPC Endpoints
rpcEndpoints.description: Configure RPC URLs for each network. Click on a network to expand and configure its endpoints.
rpcEndpoints.localhostHelp: Need to access your local network remotely?
rpcEndpoints.localhostHelpLink: Learn how to set up a tunnel with ngrok

metamask.setDefault: Set OpenScan as the default block explorer in MetaMask
